dcterms:title: Scott Pilgrim vs. the World (Theatrical Poster)
dcterms:creator: Universal Pictures Marketing Department
dcterms:contributor: Illustrators and designers for the 2010 marketing campaign
dcterms:subject: Film; Poster; Marketing; Scott Pilgrim
dcterms:description: Official theatrical release poster for the 2010 film 'Scott Pilgrim vs. the World', featuring Scott Pilgrim playing bass guitar against a stylized graphic background. Used in cinema and home media promotion.
